Zachariah or Zacharias__07.1: And it came to pass in the fourth year of king Darius, that the word of the Lord came to Zacharias, in the fourth day of the ninth month, which is Casleu.
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.2: When Sarasar, and Rogommelech, and the men that were with him, sent to the house of God, to entreat the face of the Lord:
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.3:
To speak to the priests of the house of the Lord of hosts, and to the prophets, saying: Must I weep in<u>
                the fifth month
               </u>, or must I sanctify myself as I have now done for many years?
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.4: And the word of the Lord of hosts came to me, saying:
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.5: Speak to all the people of the land, and to the priests, saying: When you fasted, and mourned in the fifth and the seventh month for these seventy years: did you keep a fast unto me?
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.6: And when you did eat and drink, did you not eat for yourselves, and drink for yourselves?
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.7: Are not these the words which the Lord spoke by the hand of the former prophets, when Jerusalem as yet was inhabited, and was wealthy, both itself and the cities round about it, and there were inhabitants towards the south, and in the plain?
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.8: And the word of the Lord came to Zacharias, saying:
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.9: Thus saith the Lord of hosts, saying: Judge ye true judgment, and shew ye mercy and compassion every man to his brother.
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.10: And oppress not the widow, and the fatherless, and the stranger, and the poor: and let not a man devise evil in his heart against his brother.
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.11: But they would not hearken, and they turned away the shoulder to depart: and they stopped their ears, not to hear.
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.12: And they made their heart as the adamant stone, lest they should hear the law, and the words which the Lord of hosts sent in his spirit by the hand of the former prophets: so a great indignation came from the Lord of hosts.
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.13: And it came to pass that as he spoke, and they heard not: so shall they cry, and I will not hear, saith the Lord of hosts.
Zachariah or Zacharias__07.14: And I dispersed them throughout all kingdoms, which they know not: and the land was left desolate behind them, so that no man passed through or returned: and they changed the delightful land into a wilderness.
